---
title: "Projects"
subtitle: "A list of my open-source work and experiments."
listing:
  contents: projects.yml
  type: table
  sort: "date desc"
  page-size: 20
  categories: false
  sort-ui: false
  filter-ui: false
  # 1. NEW COLUMN ORDER
  fields: [date, title, description, stack, code]
  field-display-names:
    date: "Date"
    title: "Project Name"
    description: "Description"
    stack: "Tech Stack"
    code: "Code"
format:
  html:
    css: styles.css
---

<style>
/* 1. RESET ALL CELLS (Uniform Font) */
table td {
  font-family: "Lora", serif !important;
  font-size: 16px !important;
  font-weight: 400 !important;      /* Normal weight for everything */
  color: #d0d0d0 !important;        /* Uniform Grey Color */
  padding-top: 15px !important;
  padding-bottom: 15px !important;
  vertical-align: top !important;
  line-height: 1.6 !important;
}

/* 2. MAKE TITLE BOLD (Column 2) */
table td:nth-child(2) {
  font-weight: 700 !important;      /* BOLD */
  color: #ffffff !important;        /* White to make it pop */
  pointer-events: none !important;  /* Unclickable */
  cursor: text !important;
}

/* 3. STYLE THE GITHUB LINK (Column 5) */
table td:nth-child(5) a {
  color: #5a9fd4 !important;        /* Blue */
  font-weight: 600 !important;
  text-decoration: none !important;
}
table td:nth-child(5) a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline !important;
}

/* 4. COLUMN WIDTHS (Adjusted for new order) */
table th:nth-child(1), table td:nth-child(1) { width: 12%; white-space: nowrap; } /* Date */
table th:nth-child(2), table td:nth-child(2) { width: 20%; } /* Title */
table th:nth-child(3), table td:nth-child(3) { width: 40%; } /* Description */
table th:nth-child(4), table td:nth-child(4) { width: 18%; font-size: 0.95em; color: #aaa !important; } /* Stack */
table th:nth-child(5), table td:nth-child(5) { width: 10%; text-align: center; } /* Code */

/* 5. HEADER STYLING */
table thead th {
  font-weight: 600 !important;
  color: #fff !important;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #444 !important;
}
</style>

<br>
